column4: I-75N just prior to the southern 75/64 split
column5: Multiple vehicles including an overturned pickup with trailer.  Two lanes are blocked.  Traffic backed up to Exit 108 / Man O War Blvd.

column4: Old Todds Rd between Mapleleaf Dr and Palumbo Dr
column5: The roadway is reportedly shutdown due to icy conditions.

column4: Man O War Blvd between Polo Club Blvd and Winchester Rd
column5: Police on scene with various stopped vehicles.  Two tow trucks enroute.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
